doc.field: Folders contain Munn correspondence received from: Melvin Albert - Nov., 1923 (copy; original in Estate Collection). H. Thomas Austern - Oct., 1927 - Nov., 1929. Alexander Baltzley - Yearly exchange of letters from Christmas 1936 to Christmas 1945; Dec. 1948 - Dec., 1957 (intermittent); Mrs. Munn, February, 1960; December, 1928, Francis J. Bloustein, 1925-1942, Benjamin and Dorothy Butner - Oct. - Nov. 1932; Nov. - Dec. 1933. Julius Evans - 1932; 1947-1948 Jacob D. Goldstein - May, 1926 Isidore S. Immerman - Jan.-Feb., 1924; June, 1926; Jan., 1947; April - May, 1959; Jan. 1962; March 1968; March, 1972; Feb., 1973; June, 1974. (Includes correspondence from Mrs. Munn). Sidney Leibowitz - Sept., 1931 - June, 1935. James L. Mandel - Aug., 1947; Nov., - Dec., 1962; March, 1960s Jacob Rabkin - Nov., 1949; July, 1951; Nov., 1952. Arthur I. Singer - July, 1943 - Nov., 1945 Hyman Lehan - Dec. 27, 1956 Irving H. Jurow - June - July, 1926; May 1971 - June 1974 Charles Norman - Aug. 1968 - Aug. 1971
